mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cart_no, user_id, product_code, product_title, product_price, product_sale_rate, cart_quantity) values (seq_cart_no.nextval, #{user_id}, #{product_code}, #{product_title}, #{product_price}, #{product_sale_rate}, #{cart_quantity})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_cart where sysdate - 7 <= cart_date and user_id = #{user_id} order by cart_date desc
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set cart_quantity = #{cart_quantity}, cart_date = sysdate where cart_no = #{cart_no}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_from where sysdate -30 >= cart_date
mapper.select: select * from tbl_cart where cart_no in ( #{no} ) order by cart_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order (user_id, order_code, order_total_price, order_state, order_addr1, order_addr2, order_addr3) values (#{user_id}, seq_order_code.nextval, #{order_total_price}, #{order_state}, #{order_addr1}, #{order_addr2}, #{order_addr3})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum, a.*from (select * from tbl_order order by order_date desc)a )b where rownum between 1 and 1
